description:
It’s unclear what defunding the police activist thought would happen if there were to be no police, but it never fails that when the going gets tough, they end up eating their own words.

‘Defund the police’ activist goes viral after begging for help when everything she owned was stolen in San Francisco: ‘The cops didn’t do s—!’ https://t.co/DaDogOu3Z7 pic.twitter.com/1e3hikGTbS
— New York Post (@nypost) December 8, 2024

Darcie Bell rented a U-Haul that contained everything she owned. However, ever
title: Defund the police activist has everything she owns stolen, can't believe "cops didn't do sh*t"

description:
In the fight to put an end to the misogynistic patriarchy that’s dedicated to destroying girls’ sports, high school students in California are organizing weekly protests in opposition to school rules that allow males to compete in the women’s division.

Heartbreaking.

- MLK HS compared a shirt two girls wore that said “Save Girls Sports” to wearing a swastika
- 150+ students wore the same shirt to school to support the girls
- The school punished the students by issuing dress code violations & barring them from attending class https://t.co/WPsVd0AotA pic.twitter.com/FXKRRSda9d
— Riley Gaines (@Riley_Gaines_)
title: Watch: Even students in a deep blue state are organizing a weekly protest to defend girls' sports against trans "competitors"

description:
As the search continues for the murderer of United Healthcare’s CEO, today’s show analyzed why so many health insurance claims are denied and it may not be for the reasons you think.

- YouTube
title: Watch: Here is why so many health insurance claims are REALLY denied

description:
We interrupt your regularly scheduled coverage of what dumb thing the media is attacking which Trump nominee over because we can all use a laugh on Monday. And this clip with Bill Murray has had me HOWLING all weekend.

The comedian was on the "New Heights" podcast with Jason Kelce and Travis Kelce (yeah, I know, blah blah Pfizer blah blah Taylor Swift). Jason brought up the classic 1980s movie "Road House" (not the lame reboot), which has a notorious sex-making scene between Patri
title: Watch: Bill Murray shares hysterically diabolical thing he does to a friend when his wife's love scene with Patrick Swayze is on

description:
Donald Trump sat down for an interview with "Meet the Press" on Sunday. None of us at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website know why. If it's us, we're sitting back and taking December off outside of playing on Truth Social. But Trump is more magnanimous and graced Kristen Welker with an interview.

He ran through his usual hits: mass deportations, tariffs. She ran through the media's usual misses: Project 2025, [solve for x] cabinet nominee is in trouble. But the highlight of all Trump interviews is when he reminds journalsimers how much they fail as humans and suck at life to their faces.

The press has to straighten itself out, because honestly it’s lost all credibility. ... You know, you would think the press would like to see strong borders, great education, a powerful military so we have a country left, and all
title: Watch: Trump SHREDS the "lost all credibility" media right to NBC News Kristen Welker's smug face

description:
After a decade of civil war, Syria has fallen, the Assad regime has ended with Bashar al-Assad seeking refuge in Moscow, Russia, we’re fact-checking NBC’s interview with President Donald Trump, as the search continues for the murderer of United Healthcare’s CEO, we’re analyzing why so many health insurance claims are denied, a Brazilian professor working in the United Kingdom won in a court case that she was discriminated against for her accent, and much more!

Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.
title: Sources: Why Syria Will Become 51st American State Without Assad
